scripts.build: esbuild server.ts --bundle --platform=node --outdir=dist && xcopy views dist\views /s /e /h /y /i && xcopy public dist\public /s /e /h /y /i
scripts.build-for-docker: esbuild server.ts --bundle --platform=node --outdir=dist && mkdir -p dist/views && mkdir -p dist/public && cp -R views/. dist/views && cp -R public/. dist/public
